Package controller

Class UpdateAppointment

java.lang.Object
controller.UpdateAppointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateAppointment extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the Update Appointment Screen, handling appointment modification functionalities. This class manages the user interface and logic for modifying existing appointments in the application. It allows users to edit details like title, description, location, type, and date/time. The system validates appointments for empty fields, valid dates/times, and overlaps with existing bookings for the chosen customer.
Author:
Daniel Akoko

  • Method Details

    • onSave

      public void onSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Event handler for the "Save" button click, saving the modified appointment details. Saves edited appointment details upon clicking the "Save" button: Extracts input from text fields and combo boxes. Validates for empty fields and business hours compliance. Checks for potential appointment overlaps with the chosen customer. Updates the appointment in the database if valid. Navigates back to the main appointment screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggering the action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error loading the scene.

    • onCancel

      public void onCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Event handler for the "Cancel" button click, prompting the user for confirmation before leaving the page. Displays a confirmation alert before returning to the appointment screen without saving changes.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggering the action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error loading the scene.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the UpdateAppointment Screen. Populates combo boxes with available contacts, customers, and users.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object.

    • modifyAppointment

      public void modifyAppointment(Appointment appointment) throws SQLException
      Populates the UpdateAppointment Screen with details of the selected appointment for modification. Pre-fills the UI elements with existing data from the selected appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to be modified.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is an error with the SQL query.

    • initializeBusinessHours

      private static javafx.collections.ObservableList<LocalTime> initializeBusinessHours(ZoneId systemZoneId, ZoneId businessZoneId, LocalTime startHour, int workingHours)
      Initializes a list of LocalTime within business hours.
      Parameters:
      systemZoneId - The system time zone.
      businessZoneId - The business time zone.
      startHour - The starting hour of business hours.
      workingHours - The number of working hours.
      Returns:
      The list of LocalTime within business hours.

    • validateBusinessHours

      static boolean validateBusinessHours(LocalTime startTime, LocalTime endTime)
      Validates that an appointment is scheduled within business hours.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time of the appointment.
      endTime - The end time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment is within business hours, otherwise false.
